message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $7,500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to get the product for a bit less. I'm willing to pay $7,000. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $7,250. What do you think?
